divs: sighting detailsabove i am unsure of day, date,time or month. i do know it was within 24 hours of stephensville news. article in texas monthly has me writing this. i reported this to my wife and friends after first news later that night of stephensville-----------i am 64 retired and respected bussiness man on lake sam rayburn. ok. on my back porch i have a panaramic view east to west. i was marvaling at the beautiful blue perfect sky. no clouds anywhere. the following is how my mind was working-----i saw a very large chrome shiny object come over east horizon many miles away. pretty plane?? now i can tell its going to pass completely over east to west in front of me. nothing but blue sky and no sun glint. my mind says that that is a big plane. next thought was where is vapor trail and its large beautiful and shiny. no vapor then must have props. but its bigger than the biggest plane. so i will hear something when its passes overhead. still no sound and no vapor and extremely long and large. dont know high but very high up and still large. mind says--hey wait a minute, there are no chrome airplanes that dont make noise are vapor. could i have seen the space station from here?? watched for 5-10 minutes then out of sight. that night the stephensville news came on and i know directions. this object was in a line from louisiana to below dallas. that night is when i told my wife that i saw it. then when they said it was mile long and 1\2 mile wide i said it easily could have been. then days later on a ufo hunter show they showed a big long cigar shape object and my wife asked if thats what i saw and i said exactly. i am home grown salt of the earth and i know what i saw and its nothing in it for me to spend 30 minutes typing this. ronnie
trends: There has been one other sighting in Jasper
There were no other sightings in Jasper on or around January 26th 2008
